name: Bleeding Degrees (Louie Chapman)
description:
Bleeding Degrees by Corrie and Louie for the GTMK Game Jam 2020 (314 out of 5000+ entries) Top 100 in "fun"

With your health tied to your ability to see, move and shoot you'll have to take damage or you'll find yourself increasingly out of control. A modern homage to old doom-style shooters.

Controls
WASD: Movement
LMB: Shoot

Team
Corrie: Art, Programming
Louie: Sound, Art, Web

This is a mirror posting of the official GMTK Game Jam Submission
